actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund.

summary.text: Title I: Inter-American Development Bank - Amends the Inter-American Development Bank Act to authorize the United States Governor of the Bank to vote for two resolutions increasing: (1) the authorized capital stock of the Bank; and (2) the resources of the Fund for Special Operations. Authorizes the U.S. Governor: (1) to subscribe to 227,896 shares of such increased authorized capital stock; and (2) to contribute $700,000,000 to such Fund. Authorizes appropriations for such purposes. Title II: Asian Development Bank - Amends the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize a United States contribution of $445,000,000 to the Asian Development Bank. Authorizes appropriations for such purpose. Title III: African Development Fund - Amends the African Development Fund Act to authorize a United States contribution of $125,000,000 to the African Development Fund. Authorizes appropriations for such purpose. Title IV: Effective Date - Prohibits the use or obligation of such authorized appropriated funds prior to October 1, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund.
